Key Match Events: Tatum produced an electric shooting performance to pour in 18 points from 3-point range over the two quarters
Boston took a commanding 74-55 lead into the break
Boston coasted home to close out the win
Pre-Game Insights: Boston celebrated raising its record-breaking 18th championship banner
Tatum told the crowd, 'Let's enjoy this moment together. I can honestly say, to the best fans in the world â€” let's do it again.'
Post-Match Reflections: Tatum finished with 10 assists and four rebounds in addition to his 37 points
White added 24 points and Brown 23. Holiday added 18 while Al Horford chipped in with 11
Jalen Brunson led the Knicks scoring with 22 points, alongside Miles McBride with 22 from the bench
